content:
For any payer systems looking to integrate PAS workflows that launches a SMART app via CDS Hooks: We, Cerner, do not yet support developers in self-service registering and simulating CDS Hooks calls from our developer portal tools (https://code.cerner.com/developer/smart-on-fhir/apps). We can work with any developer to manually register your CDS Hooks services within our open EHR testing environment. A few things to keep in mind:

  • We support patient-view, order-select, and order-sign hooks.
  • Be sure your SMART app is running over port 443 or 80
  • Any appContext returned by the CDS Hooks Service should be a simple string. We don't have full support on it yet. Furthermore, the appContext value will be in the access token as cerner_appContext field. This is only for our current Connectathon server, and not intended as a long term solution.

cc: @Hans Buitendijk

MCG SoF - PHL" was attempting to request access to healthcare data with FHIR Play Millennium; unfortunately, the application doesn't appear to be compatible. If you require further assistance, please contact support.
If possible, please bookmark this page or take a screen shot of it to expedite the technical support process. For assistance, contact support via:
E-mail:sample@provider-example.com
Phone:123-456-7890
Information to provide to Technical Support
Correlation ID:1753c53e-c85b-4bf8-8365-909b6a018ba4
Information to provide to MCG SoF - PHL
The requested redirect URI does not match the one registered for "MCG SoF - PHL" because of inconsistent usages of trailing slashes in the URIs.
Error Code:urn:cerner:error:authorization-server:oauth2:grant:invalid-redirect-uri-trailing-slash
Cerner's developer portal may provide useful information to assist in resolving this issue.
@Eric Sornson I am getting the above error. I am wondering, would you be able to help

discussing this over private message, but it the trailing-slash error message seems to indicate an issue with your redirectURI not matching what you've registered in our Auth Server, and may differ by a trailing slash
Cooper, here is the link to CDS service on the Humana side https://pahooks-dot-hum-hcs-rapid-fhir-sbx.appspot.com/cds-services
